entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 08:30 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness except mainly cloudy north of Marystown. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:44 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 09:44 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023
